title: BREATHTAKING VIEWS! 2 Bed/3 Bath close to food & entertainment!!!!
posting_body: Reasons You’ll Love Living at Clay Park Tower:
- Luxurious community in the prestigious Pacific Heights District.
- Apartment amenities include wood-style flooring, stone countertops and stainless steel appliances.
- Amazing views include the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, Downtown San Francisco, and the bay.
- Located near Lafayette Park, Fillmore, Polk and Union Streets.
- Easy access to public transportation, restaurants, shops and more!
- Walkable area and gated garage parking.
- Water/Sewer & trash INCLUDED!
- Copy and paste link in browser to view a similar unit: <URL>
NEIGHBORHOOD
Lafayette Park, 11 acres of fun (0.1 miles)
Nearby Muni lines: 10, 1, 30, 24, 49
Shops & Cafes on Fillmore Street (0.6 miles)
Bars & Bites on Polk Street (0.2 miles)
Whole Foods (0.2 miles)

* Pets Welcome

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
